nodes.text: Commodore Mabettye was a Mon Calamari officer in the New Republic Defense Fleet.

Mabettyte was the commander of the Mon Calamari light cruiser Poesy, which was assigned to Duro during the Yuuzhan Vong War. He was killed when the Poesy was destroyed by invading Yuuzhan Vong warships during the Battle of Duro.
